comment:
* A simple dialog containing an {@link android.widget.DatePicker}. *

* See the Pickers * guide.

methods.name: static int resolveDialogTheme(@NonNull Context context, @StyleRes int themeResId)
public void onDateChanged(@NonNull DatePicker view, int year, int month, int dayOfMonth)
public void setOnDateSetListener(@Nullable OnDateSetListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Sets the listener to call when the user sets the date.
     *
     * @param listener the listener to call when the user sets the date

methods.name: public void onClick(@NonNull DialogInterface dialog, int which)
public DatePicker getDatePicker()
methods.comment:
* Returns the {@link DatePicker} contained in this dialog.
     *
     * @return the date picker

methods.name: public void updateDate(int year, int month, int dayOfMonth)
methods.comment:
* Sets the current date.
     *
     * @param year the year
     * @param month the month (0-11 for compatibility with
     *              {@link Calendar#MONTH})
     * @param dayOfMonth the day of month (1-31, depending on month)

methodNames: static int resolveDialogTheme(@NonNull Context context, @StyleRes int themeResId)
public void onDateChanged(@NonNull DatePicker view, int year, int month, int dayOfMonth)
public void onClick(@NonNull DialogInterface dialog, int which)
public void updateDate(int year, int month, int dayOfMonth)
